item.title: War Secretary Hegseth Vows More to Come in Nigeria
item.description: Secretary of War Pete Hegseth said Thursday night that U.S. forces struck Islamic State group targets in Nigeria on Christmas, confirming military act...

item.title: Sens. Collins, Ossoff Renowned for Constituent Services
item.description: Sens. Susan Collins, R-Maine, and Jon Ossoff, D-Ga., are two of the most vulnerable senators seeking reelection in the 2026 midterm elections.

item.title: Del Cueto to Newsmax: Democrats Aim to Defend Illegals
item.description: Art Del Cueto, a veteran border official, told Newsmax on Thursday that anyone in the country illegally is breaking the law.
